message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

In the cash flow statement, this item is typically shown as "Depreciation" in the Cash Flow From Operating Activities section.

Looking at the given problem, I can see a line item called "Depreciation" with an amount of 96479.34.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of an asset over its useful life, which is exactly what the task is asking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '96479.34'} }
```
